name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 063
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, So Say We All, the rallying call of General Adama of BattleStar Galactica.  I’ve thought about the shared purpose the people of BattleStar had in attempting to preserve the human race. I often thought to myself, if we were in a similar apocalyptic position would we come together for the “greater good”?  I think the past year and a half gave me the answer, and it’s not a hopeful one.
